attributes.action: Scottish citizens residing abroad to have a vote within IndyRef 2
attributes.additional_details:
There has been a number of studies which suggestion that not being allowed a vote disenfranchises those who will be impacted by such a decision.  
One such study is below.
http://www.democraticaudit.com/?p=7956
attributes.background: In the previous independence referendum it was not possible for Scottish citizens residing abroad to take part in any vote.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/143274
